conversations.conversation: My man work and I have cleaning off the full house, later I have to take the caravan too.
Home alone, my man work ;

cut grass this day.
;Wait for my husband, work today too .

My husband work,
;This day is the first day without cigarette, I do not for how long time I and my husband clear this.

My husband work.
;We shall meet the doctor today ;
Wait for my husband so we can eat.
Tonight come the boys ;

My husband work.
;I will work later, renovated house be decent clean before sell.

My husband work at volvo, skövde, at the time right now.
;I work with the company paper in caravan.

My husband works in Gävle this time.
;
;I hate to be alone at home.
;Miss him.
;The times goes so slow ;
I have got my new eyes ;
